faq.title: FAQ
faq.intro: Get answers to the most frequent questions.

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: Ideally 4 to 6 weeks before arrival to secure the best availabilities.

items.question: Do you cover every province?
items.answer: Quebec, Ontario, British Columbia and the Atlantic provinces. Contact us for other regions.

items.question: Are your services suited for students?
items.answer: Yes, we provide dedicated offers and support for university paperwork.

items.question: Is there support after installation?
items.answer: The Premium pack includes 30 days of follow-up, extendable on demand.

items.question: Do you help with administrative paperwork?
items.answer: Yes: SIN, banking, RAMQ, phone plans, insurance and more depending on the pack.

items.question: Are you multilingual?
items.answer: FR / EN / AR. We adapt our support to your language.

items.question: What happens if my visa is delayed?
items.answer: We reschedule without agency fees; only third-party costs already incurred remain due.

items.question: Can you guarantee housing?
items.answer: Confirmed bookings in Standard and Premium depending on your file and the market.

items.question: Do you work with partners?
items.answer: Banks, providers, institutions ‚Äî full transparency on our partnerships.

items.question: Is my data protected?
items.answer: Yes, confidentiality is key. See our Privacy Policy.
